title: Sure, here's a list of 20 notable articles on non-autoregressive models (NAR) for fast sequence generation up to 2022. These papers cover various aspects of NAR models, including their development, improvements, and applications
Non-autoregressive neural machine translation."** ACL
This seminal paper introduces the concept of non-autoregressive neural machine translation (NAR-NMT
Deterministic non-autoregressive neural sequence modeling by iterative refinement."** EMNLP
Proposes an iterative refinement approach to improve the quality of NAR models
Fast decoding in sequence models using discrete latent variables."** ICML
Introduces discrete latent variables to improve the performance of NAR models
Mask-predict: Parallel decoding of conditional masked language models."** EMNLP-IJCNLP
Proposes the Mask-Predict model for parallel decoding in NAR frameworks
Insertion transformer: Flexible sequence generation via insertion operations."** ICML
Introduces the Insertion Transformer, which generates sequences by inserting tokens
Non-autoregressive machine translation with auxiliary regularization."** AAAI
Discusses the use of auxiliary regularization to enhance NAR models
FlowSeq: Non-autoregressive conditional sequence generation with generative flow."** EMNLP-IJCNLP
Proposes FlowSeq, which uses generative flow for NAR sequence generation
Fast structured decoding for sequence models."** NeurIPS
Introduces methods for fast structured decoding in NAR models
Non-autoregressive neural machine translation with enhanced decoder input."** AAAI
Enhances NAR models by improving the decoder input
Guiding non-autoregressive neural machine translation decoding with reordering information."** AAAI
Uses reordering information to guide NAR decoding
Non-autoregressive machine translation with latent alignments."** EMNLP
Introduces latent alignments to improve NAR translation quality
Glancing transformer for non-autoregressive neural machine translation."** ACL
Proposes the Glancing Transformer, which selectively attends to parts of the input sequence
Aligned cross entropy for non-autoregressive machine translation."** ICML
Introduces the Aligned Cross Entropy loss to improve NAR models
Parallel machine translation with disentangled context transformer."** ICML
Proposes a disentangled context transformer for parallel machine translation
Non-autoregressive text generation with pre-trained language models."** NeurIPS
Explores the use of pre-trained language models for NAR text generation
Levenshtein transformer."** NeurIPS
Introduces the Levenshtein Transformer, which generates sequences through insertion and deletion operations
Semi-autoregressive training improves non-autoregressive translation."** EMNLP
Discusses semi-autoregressive training to enhance NAR models
Hint-based training for non-autoregressive translation."** EMNLP
Proposes hint-based training to improve NAR translation models
MASS: Masked sequence to sequence pre-training for language generation."** ICML
Introduces MASS, a pre-training method for sequence-to-sequence models that can be applied to NAR models
Understanding knowledge distillation in non-autoregressive machine translation."** ICLR
Investigates the role of knowledge distillation in improving NAR models
These articles provide a comprehensive overview of the advancements in non-autoregressive models for fast sequence generation up to
